job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are currently looking for Software Engineers to join our Product Capabilities team Ifnbspyou are passionate about software development sharing knowledge growing your skills and working with great people then join us Our engineering team is growing and we are looking for extraordinary engineers who enjoy building as much as we donbspYou will have the opportunity to contribute to the evolution of a world class engineering team The solutions you build will enable you the opportunity to positively change livesnbspppstrongnbspstrongppstrongWhat Youll GainstrongppYou will get experience working with a crossdisciplinary team shipping realworld products to our customers around the nation In the Product Capabilities team you will work with the latest technologies such as Golang Kafka and GCP Our team culture is autonomous yet collaborative and supportiveppstrongnbspnbspstrongppstrongYour ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliDesign develop test unitintegrationetc deploy and maintain application codeliliDevelop multiregion high performance servicesnbspliliWork with a variety of technologies Go Ruby Postgres Redis Kafka and moreliliParticipate in the design process to expectationsliulpstrongnbspstrongppstrongnbspRequirementsstrongpulliDemonstrated working experience with common backend service languages such as Golang Python Ruby Java Rust etcliliDemonstrated for the full software development life cycle including coding standards code reviews source control management build processes testing and operationsliliComprehension of the principles of API design
